title: Singularity Growth appoints Sandeep Bapat as senior partner, co-chief investment officer
description: In his new role, Bapat will be responsible for identifying key trends and eventual steady-state outcome for current and potential portfolio companies. With a focus on delivering returns for portfolio companies, he will have leadership responsibilities for investment activities at the firm besides serving as a member of the investment committee.
